Posts.Content: I cannot imagine how you are feeling right now,it must have been a tremendous shock for you and is every woman's worst nightmare. Please be strong and try to stay positive and throw everything you can at this. I wish you lots of love and blessings and am here if you ever need support. I hope that you have loving people around you to help you through this terrible time. Xxxx Report
Posts.Title: Just been told yesterday I have a breast cancer.....my world is crashing and I need some advice plea
